name: Climatic Plastic
description:
↓↓↓    HOW TO PLAY    ↓↓↓

One Button Gameplay! Just tap or click on the game's screen to do stuff

Tap or click anywhere on the screen to make Vitara (AKA the earth guy) jump and charge forward!

Release your tap or your click to make them do a slap! Use this slap to slap plastic monsters!

Tap or click on the heads at the bottom right of the screen (for the computer players, you could also use the space bar) to swap your character!

When playing as Surfoon (AKA the moon guy) tap anywhere on the screen to move them! Change their spot so you will be able to catch those single-use plastic bits breaking off the plastic monsters!

The rest you can find out on your own! Along with the help of ingame tips and facts when you die! Tips mainly help you improve your gameplay, while facts are for informing you about certain aspects of humanity's current plastic pollution problems.

After you complete the campaign, try out endless mode! In this mode the waves of plastic monsters never stop!

This game was made for a school project
